title: Public Service Announcement:  Should I use a tent or an RV at Burning Man?
author: Caveat Magister
content:
This is a controversial issue that people never seem to stop arguing about: what’s the best way to experience Burning Man? In a tent or an RV?

To help, we’ve short circuited the heated rhetoric with this cool, dispassionate, comparison of the two approaches: what are the pros, and what are the cons?

Want more PSAs, covering everything from coping with traffic to finding an orgy? No problem – they’re all archived here!
